text: Uribealdea Rugby Kirol Elkartea is a Spanish rugby team based in Mungia. ==History== The club was established in 2008 through a merger of Mungia RT and Kakarraldo Rugby Taldea . ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" !Season !Tier !Division !Pos. !Notes ! |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2009–10 | align="center"|3 | Primera Nacional | align="center"|1st | style="background:#90EE90"|Promoted | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2010–11 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|8th | style="background:#ffcccc"|Relegated | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2011–12 | align="center"|3 | Primera Nacional | align="center"|4th | | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2012–13 | align="center"|3 | Primera Nacional | align="center"|2nd | style="background:#90EE90"|Promoted | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2013–14 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|2nd | | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2014–15 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"|5th | | |- |style="background:#efefef;"|2015–16 | align="center"|2 | División de Honor B | align="center"| | | |- |2016-17 |2 |División de Honor B | | | |- |2017-18 |B |División de Honor B | | | |- |2018-19 |B |División de Honor B | | | |- |2019-20 |B |División de Honor B | | | |} |} \---- *8 seasons in División de Honor B ==References== ==External links== *Spanish Rugby Union Fixtures Category:Rugby clubs established in 2008 Category:Basque rugby union teams
title: Uribealdea RKE
